```
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:id="@+id/main"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 android:gravity="center"
 android:orientation="vertical"
 tools:context=".Activities.SignupActivity">

 <EditText
 android:id="@+id/Signup_EditText_Username"
 android:textSize="20sp"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:hint="Username" />

 <EditText
 android:id="@+id/Signup_EditText_Password"
 android:textSize="20sp"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:hint="Password" />
 <Button
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:onClick="CreateUser"
 android:text="Create"/>
 <Button
 android:id="@+id/button2"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:onClick="Close"
 android:text="Close" />

 <TextView
 android:id="@+id/textView"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="This is empty" />

</LinearLayout>
```"},{"role":"assistant","content":"

I see the issue. The IDs in the layout file actually match exactly what you're using in the Java code (`Signup_EditText_Username` and `Signup_EditText_Password`). The error might be caused by:

1. The layout file not being properly synced/built
2. A caching issue in Android Studio

Try these quick steps to resolve it:

1. First do a "Build > Clean Project" in Android Studio
2. Then "Build > Rebuild Project"

If that doesn't resolve it, try "File > Invalidate Caches / Restart..."

The code itself is correct as the IDs in both the layout and Java files match exactly. This appears to be more of a build/IDE issue rather than a code issue."}]}
